recipesList.title: Recipe1
recipesList.directions: Prepare Greens: Wash and tear mixed salad greens.Chop Veggies: Slice tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, carrots, and bell peppers.Combine Ingredients: Mix veggies in a bowl, add optional feta cheese.
